feature: ▶▶ BURNING YOUR BELLY FAT- This Waist Trimmer ab belt increases your core temperature during exercise improving sweating and activity.It can not only help you burn calories , lose weight, burn belly rest fat , shape your body, but also effectively support your lower back and reduce the risk of injuries during exercises.To be more tightened for your core muscle .

▶▶ ECO-FRIENDLY MATERIAL & UNIQUE DESIGN- Made with Professional Highest Grade latex free Neoprene for superior heat insulation.This ab Belt is super durable, washable and antibacterial. It’s healthy to your body, non-toxic ,breathable ,and no unpleasant odor. Specially designed to repel Sweat & Moisture, it’s the best sauna waist trimmer belt. To have a best sauna effect at home ! Never worried about distortion or losing compression after washing .

▶▶ PREMIUM WAIST TRIMMER-Anti-pilling finish on the surface and non-slip grid lining, has the ability of sweat and moisture wicking material. And it’s lightweight for you to bring along while traveling. With the nice package, it’s a great choice for you to buy as a gift. No-hassle guarantee is a backup for you too.
